name: empire-engine
description: Let's build a connected world together

scripts.test: echo running server tests... && cd test && DEBUG="empire" ts-node --ignore-warnings 2345 ../node_modules/blue-tape/bin/blue-tape "**/*.ts" | tap-spec
scripts.test+debug: echo running server tests... && cd test && DEBUG=* ts-node --ignore-warnings 2345 ../node_modules/blue-tape/bin/blue-tape "**/*.ts" | tap-spec
scripts.browser-test: echo running browser tests... && echo no browser test
scripts.source-test: echo running source tests... &&  echo no source test
scripts.types-publish: npm -s run lint+build+test && echo please publish to typings/registry
scripts.build+test: npm run build && npm run all-tests
scripts.lint+build+test: npm run lint && npm run build+test

author: Craig OConnor
